definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: The southern portion of the country is taken up by the Gobi Desert, while the northern and western portions are mountainous.
sentences.chinese: 該國南部是戈壁大沙漠，北部和西部都是高山。

sentences.english: The arid valleys of the Minjiang River is the worst ecotope in West China.
sentences.chinese: 岷江干旱河谷是我國西部生態環境最惡劣的地區之一。

sentences.english: S. senator. In Congress, Johnson was a strong advocate of America's westward expansion.
sentences.chinese: 在國會里，強森大力支持美國向西部擴張的計畫。

sentences.english: Loess is widely distributed in China, and it mainly lies in the central and western regions.
sentences.chinese: 黃土在我國分佈廣泛，而且主要分佈在中西部地區。

sentences.english: They were enticed westward by dreams of gold.
sentences.chinese: 他們被黃金夢引誘到西部。

sentences.english: The Rockets were a popular choice to make the Western Conference finals when the season began.
sentences.chinese: 賽季初的時候，火箭是衆望所歸的西部決賽球隊。

sentences.english: West Lake has a Sai Tai, breakwaters repair a Form 6 beautiful bridge.
sentences.chinese: 湖西部有一西堤，堤上修有六座造形優美的橋。

sentences.english: The Prut River forms Moldova"s entire western boundary with Romania."
sentences.chinese: 普魯特河形成了整個西部與羅馬尼亞的國界線。

sentences.english: Many children in the west don't have to go to school.
sentences.chinese: 很多西部地區的孩子沒有足夠的錢上不起學。

sentences.english: China’s 12 western provinces and regions remain relatively underdeveloped in terms of economy and social development.
sentences.chinese: 中國西部的12個省區，經濟社會發展水平相對落後。

sentences.english: An island of the west-central Philippines south of Luzon. It was first visited by Spaniards in1570.
sentences.chinese: 民都洛島菲律賓中西部一島嶼，位於呂宋島以南。

sentences.english: I only watch when there's western on.
sentences.chinese: 只有演西部片的時候我纔看。

sentences.english: Western China is characterized by high-altitude airfields and extreme hot and cold climate conditions.
sentences.chinese: 中國西部有着典型的高海拔機場和極端溫度環境。

sentences.english: In the central and western regions, rural credit cooperatives should he defined in the policy and financial cooperation in finance.
sentences.chinese: 在中西部地區，農信社應定位於合作性金融。

sentences.english: Then between the east and the west, we have what we call the City,
sentences.chinese: 然後在東西部之間是中部，我們稱之爲城市。

sentences.english: Located in the west of the planned area, adjacent to the tourism zone and the downtown area.
sentences.chinese: 位於規劃區西部，毗鄰旅遊經濟區和中心行政區。

definition: Northwest China (Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Ningxia, Xinjiang)
